The wiki

Everything I write lives in a single folder of plain text notes, my second brain. By default, I keep these notes private. Some, however, find their way into this public space, a digital garden of sorts. It's a place for unfinished ideas, honest mistakes, and questions. Soft stances, lived experiences, and critical notes on the things I hold dear.

Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She's interested in humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking. She engages in mellow cultural and critical analysis, linking and tinkering on her personal website, zinzy.website .
